meaningMnemonic: Both of these kanji have to do with names. You have both <kanji>family name</kanji> and <kanji>name</kanji>. Both of those names together makes for a <vocabulary>First And Last Name</vocabulary>... a <vocabulary>full name</vocabulary> if you will.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
